page.title: 14THE WORK OUR PARENTS DO.
page.content: Of the mothers, 7 are Housewives with no other employment. 2 are involved, with their respective husbands in running (a)the local Public House and (b)the Post Office/Shop/Cafe. 1 is a part-time taxi driver for a local firm. 1 is a part-time barmaid at the local public house. 1 is a waitress at the local restaurant and another is a housecleaner. { {(Full-time employment prospects in the {immediate locality are very restricted {for both males and females. Personal {transport would seem to be essential {as public transport, to serve the {village, is somewhat limited.)
